metadata.Description: Protection of data from unauthorized access and ensuring its confidentiality and integrity.

level 1.Description: Data privacy and security implements privacy regulations to protect personal information from unauthorized access and use.
Data privacy and security funds cybersecurity research to develop advanced technologies and strategies for protecting data from cyber threats.
Data privacy and security focuses on data encryption to ensure that sensitive information is securely stored and transmitted.
Data privacy and security is an integral part of information technology systems to safeguard data from unauthorized access and breaches.
Data privacy and security partners with government agencies to develop and enforce policies and regulations for protecting data privacy.
Data privacy and security contributes to building trust in digital services by ensuring the confidentiality and integrity of personal data.
Data privacy and security monitors data breaches to identify vulnerabilities and take necessary measures to prevent future incidents.
Data privacy and security targets cybercriminals to detect and mitigate their activities that pose a threat to data privacy and security.
Data privacy and security addresses data protection laws to ensure compliance and protect individuals' rights regarding their personal data.

subelement_relations.Description: Data protection involves implementing measures to safeguard personal and sensitive information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. It includes practices such as data anonymization, pseudonymization, and data minimization.
Data encryption is the process of converting data into a code or cipher to prevent unauthorized access. It ensures that only authorized individuals or systems can decrypt and access the data.

Access control refers to the mechanisms and policies implemented to regulate and restrict access to data. It includes authentication, authorization, and audit controls to ensure that only authorized individuals can access the data.

A data breach is an incident where unauthorized individuals gain access to sensitive or confidential data. It can result in the loss, theft, or exposure of data, leading to privacy and security risks.

Cybersecurity involves protecting computer systems, networks, and data from digital attacks, unauthorized access, and damage. It includes measures such as firewalls, antivirus software, and intrusion detection systems.
